Verses: 1 karththaraal Eremiyaavukku Undaana Vasanam:
2 nee Ezhundhu, Kuyavan Veettirkuppo; Ange En Vaarththaigalai Unakkuth Therivippen Endraar.
3 appadiye Naan Kuyavan Veettirkup Ponen, Idho, Avan Thirigaiyinaale Vanaindhukondirundhaan.

4 kuyavan Vanaindhukondirundha Manpaandam Avan Kaiyile Kettuppoyitru; Appozhudhu Adhaith Thiruththamaai Seyyumpadikku, Than Paarvaikku Sariyaaik Kandapadi Kuyavan Adhaith Thirumba Verepaandamaaga Vanaindhaan.
5 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Vasanam Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

6 isravel Kudumbaththaare, Indhak Kuyavan Seydhadhupola Naan Ungalukku Seyyak Koodaadho Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Idho Isravel Veettaare, Kaliman Kuyavan Kaiyil Irukkiradhupola Neengal En Kaiyil Irukkireergal.
7 pidunguven, Idippen, Azhippen Endru Naan Oru Jaadhikku Virodhamaagavum, Oru Raajyaththukku Virodhamaagavum Sonnamaaththiraththil,
8 naan Virodhamaai Pesina Andha Jaadhiyaar Thangal Theengaivittuth Thirumbinaal, Naanum Avargalukku Seyya Ninaiththa Theengai Seyyaadhapadikku, Manam Maaruven.
9 kattuven, Naattuven Endrum, Oru Jaadhiyaiyum Oru Raajyaththaiyum Kuriththu Naan Sollugiradhumundu.
10 avargal En Saththaththaikkelaamal, En Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seyvaargalaanaal, Naanum Avargalukku Arulseyven Endru Sonna Nanmaiyai Seyyaadhapadikku Manam Maaruven.

11 ippozhudhum, Nee Yoodhaavin Manusharaiyum Erusalemin Kudigalaiyum Nokki: Idho, Naan Ungalukku Virodhamaaga Oru Theengai Uruvappaduththi, Ungalukku Virodhamaaga Oru Kaariyaththai Yosikkiren; Aagaiyaal, Ungalil Ovvoruvarum Than Pollaadha Vazhiyaivittuth Thirumbi, Ungal Vazhigalaiyum, Ungal Kiriyaigalaiyum Seerppaduththungal Endru Karththar Uraikkiraar Endru Sol.
12 aanaalum Avargal: Adhu Koodaadha Kaariyam, Naangal Engal Yosanaigalinpadiye Nadandhu, Avaravar Thamtham Pollaadha Irudhayaththinudaiya Kadinaththinpadiye Seyvom Engiraargal.

13 aagaiyaal Karththar Sollugiraar: Ippadippattavaigalaik Kelvippattavan Yaar Endru Purajaadhigalukkulle Visaariththuppaarungal; Migavum Thidukkidaththakka Kaariyaththai Isravel Ennum Kannigai Seygiraal.
14 leebanonin Uraindha Mazhai Vayal Veliyin Kanmalaiyilirundhu Atruppogiradhundo? Odivarugira Anniyadhesaththuk Kulirndha Thanneergal Vadindhu Pogiradhundo?

15 en Janangalo Ennai Marandhu, Maayaiyaana Vikkiragangalukkuth Thoobankaattugiraargal; Seppanidappadaadha Paadhaigalilum Vazhiyilum Avargal Nadakkumpadi, Avaigal Avargalaip Poorva Paadhaigalaagiya Avargaludaiya Vazhigalilirundhu Idarumpadi Seygiradhu.

16 naan Avargaludaiya Dhesaththaip Paazhaakkavum, Endrendraikkum Eesalittu Nindhikkum Nindhaiyaakkavum Seyyumpadi Ippadi Seygiraargal; Adhaik Kadandhupogira Evanum Bramiththu, Than Thalaiyaith Thulukkuvaan.

17 kondalkaatrup Parakkadikkumaappol Naan Avargalai Avargal Saththurukkalukku Munbaagap Parakkadippen; Avargaludaiya Aabaththin Naalile En Mugaththaiyalla, En Mudhugai Avargalukkuk Kaattuven Endru Sol Endraar.

18 adharku Avargal: Eremiyaavukku Virodhamaaga Aalosanai Seyvom Vaarungal; Aasaariyaridaththile Vedhamum, Gnaanigalidaththile Aalosanaiyum, Theerkkadharisigalidaththile Vasanamum Ozhindhupovadhillai. Ivan Vaarththaigalai Naam Gavaniyaamal, Ivanai Naavinaale Vettippoduvom Vaarungal Endraargal.
19 karththaave Neer Ennai Gavaniththu, Ennode Vazhakkaadugiravargalin Saththaththaik Kelum.

20 nanmaikkuth Theemaiyai Sarikkattalaamo? En Aaththumaavukkup Padukuzhiyai Vettugiraargale; Ummudaiya Ukkiraththai Avargalaivittuth Thiruppumpadikku Naan Avargalukkaaga Nanmaiyaip Pesa Umakkumunbaaga Nindradhai Ninaiththarulum.

21 aagaiyaal, Avargaludaiya Pillaigalaip Panjaththukku Oppukkoduththu, Avargalaip Pattayaththukku Iraiyaakkividum; Avargal Manaivigal Pillaigalatravargalum Vidhavaigalumaagi, Avargal Purushargal Kolaiseyyappattu, Avargal Vaalibargal Yuththaththile Pattayavettaal Madiyakkadavargal.
22 neer Sadidhiyil Avargalmel Raanuvaththai Varappannugaiyaal, Kookkural Avargal Veedugalilirundhu Ketkappadakkadavadhu; Ennaip Pidikkap Padukuzhiyai Vetti, En Kaalgalukkuk Kannigalai Vaiththaargale.

23 aanaalum Karththaave, Avargal Enakku Virodhamaai Seyyum Kolaipaadhaga Yosanaiyaiyellaam Neer Ariveer; Avargaludaiya Akkiramaththai Umadhu Kannukku Maraivaaga Moodaamalum, Avargal Paavaththaik Kulaikkaamalum Iruppeeraaga; Avargal Umakku Munbaagak Kavizhkkappadakkadavargal, Umadhu Kobaththin Kaalaththile Ippadi Avargalukku Seyyum.
